nodes.text: LEGO Star Wars Holiday Sticker Book
LEGO Star Wars Holiday Sticker Book is a sticker book in the LEGO Star Wars series. It was written by Tori Kosara and published by Dorling Kindersley on October 20, 2020.

Build a snow-droid. Add some festive sparkle to favorite LEGO® Star Wars™ characters, including Yoda and Darth Vader. Help Han Solo and Chewbacca deliver gifts in a speeder pulled by a tauntaun. Choose the best holiday gift for the leader of the Dark Side.
